keywords.term: Rabirius or Varius; Carmen de bello actiaco sive alexandrino

revisionDesc.change: Submit - Entered text from reference edition, added metadata.

div.p: The fragments from the Oxford drawings have been digitally edited by Sara Fenoglio and Elena Barchielli as part of the course on Digital Editions of Fragmentary Texts at Ca'Foscari University of Venice. Revision by Holger Essler.
